snippet: "I only drink mine," Edik Baturin warns when talk turns to samogon, a potent, chest-warming moonshine he brews in his shack in the shadow of the Caucasus mountains....

headline.print_headline: Life Has Changed but at Least There's Samogon
headline.main: Life Has Changed but at Least There's Samogon

lead_paragraph: "I only drink mine," Edik Baturin warns when talk turns to samogon, a potent, chest-warming moonshine he brews in his shack in the shadow of the Caucasus mountains.
